name: Planet rider
description:
This game was made for the Goedware game jam 4 (the theme was space). I didn't work a lot on this game in the week but I think it isn't too bad.

I will try to post the devlog as soon as I can (it will probably be on how I implemented the gravity).

In this game, you have to complete levels by reaching a target, but the gravity is special. You are attracted by the planets and black holes.

Controls :

WASD to move

Space to boost

'R' to restart the level
